bio: Dan Lubbers is a Photographer / Retoucher / Web Developer who has lived in Kentucky, Utah and most recently Upstate NY. Lubbers got his start with Extreme Sports Photography when he was the sole photographer on the La Sportiva Solutions Climbing Tour in 2007. Between 2015 - 2018, he worked as a Digital Technician, Retoucher and Photographer at Amazonâ€™s largest photo studio primarily working in the Jewelry and Watch department. In 2018, he was the lead retoucher for Tempurpedics AD campaign. Between 2018 - 2020, Lubbers was a photographer for The Frances Young Tang Museum at Skidmore College in Saratoga Springs, NY. In 2020 during the pandemic he worked remotely as a Front End Web Developer for a Healthcare startup in NY. Lubbers has a passion for Environmental & Fine Art Portraiture as well as being out in nature exploring the realms of the cosmos through astrophotography. A love of good coffee usually leads one to find him at local coffee shops or making a brew on the hatch of his vehicle while in remote locations. Other interests include psychology, philosophy, meditation, spirituality, hot springs and asian cuisine. Go connect with him on social media!
quote: "Life is too short not to create something with every breath we draw" ~ Maynard James Keenan
